item.title: Cryptocurrency startups raised a total of $2.6 billion in July, bringing the year-to-date total funding above last year's full-year total.
item.description: On August 1st, as per the data from Defillama, cryptocurrency startups managed to raise $2.6 billion in July. This has brought the total amount raised by the crypto industry thus far this year to $13 billion, which has surpassed the total amount raised in 2024, which was $9.5 billion.Moreover, among the top three projects in terms of fundraising in July, they are: pump.fun ($590 million), OSL Group ($300 million), and Upexi ($200 million). (DLNews)

item.title: AI Computing Economy Layer GAIB Completes $10M Strategic Investment, Led by Amber Group
item.description: On August 1st, the AI Computational Economy Layer GAIB announced the successful completion of a $10 million strategic investment. The current round of funding was led by Amber Group. The funds will be directly utilized to purchase tokenized GPU assets on the GAIB platform in order to enhance the on-chain deployment of AI computing power infrastructure and attract a greater number of institutional participants.In December of last year, GAIB announced the completion of a $5 million seed round of financing. This round was led by Hack VC, Faction VC, and Hashed. Other participating investors included Spartan, Animoca Brands, MH Ventures, Aethir, Near Foundation, Chris Yin of Plume Network, and Lucas Kozinski of Renzo Protocol.GAIB is a developing encrypted artificial intelligence platform. Its goal is to tokenize GPUs, thereby making AI computing (the computational power required for training and running AI models) more readily accessible. AI computing is typically provided by GPUs and

item.title: Total Liq Count (24h): $759M, 180K People Liquidated
item.description: On August 1st, based on Coinglass data, a total of $7.59 billion in liquidations occurred across the entire network in the past 24 hours. Of this, $7.07 billion came from long positions. Additionally, in the last 24 hours, a total of 184,883 people were liquidated globally. The largest single liquidation took place on Binance - ETHUSD_PERP, with a value of $13.7912 million.

item.title: Coinbase Bitcoin Holdings Surpass Tesla Once Again, Enter Top Ten Bitcoin Treasury Companies
item.description: On August 1st, based on the data from bitcointreasuries, Coinbase increased its holdings of BTC by 2509 coins during Q2 and reached a total of 11,700 coins. As a result, Coinbase's Bitcoin holdings once again exceeded Tesla's, entering the top ten Bitcoin-holding companies.

item.title: European cryptocurrency platform Bitpanda's Co-Founder and Co-CEO Paul Klanschek steps down, transitions to an advisory role
item.description: On August 1st, Paul Klanschek, the co-founder and co-CEO of the European cryptocurrency platform Bitpanda, announced his resignation and transition to an advisory role. His duties will be taken over by Lukas Enzersdorfer-Konrad, the deputy CEO.After achieving remarkable annual performance, Bitpanda is currently evaluating strategic options, including a listing in Frankfurt. The company had previously explored the possibility of going public last year, with a potential valuation of $4 billion (according to Bloomberg).

item.title: Ahead of the Non-Farm Payrolls data, the probability of "Fed Rate Cut by 25 Basis Points in September" on Polymarket has dropped to 38%.
item.description: August 1st: The US non-farm payroll data is set to be released this evening. The market generally anticipates that this data will have a substantial impact on the Fed's September interest rate decision.As of the time of writing, on Polymarket, the probability of "the Fed cutting interest rates by 25 basis points in September" has decreased to 38%, while the probability of maintaining the interest rate has risen to 60%.

item.title: DAO List: USD1 TVL Surpasses $80 Million, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: On August 1st, according to official channels, the USD1 TVL of Lista DAO has exceeded 80 million US dollars and reached a new historical high. WLFI entered into a strategic partnership with Lista DAO on May 7th. Currently, Lista DAO has become the largest on-chain DeFi protocol for USD1.Moreover, in the BSC ecosystem, the meme coin Dora has provided 4 million USD1 in liquidity to Lista DAO, playing a key supporting role in enabling USD1 to surpass an 80 million US dollar TVL.

item.title: The Whale Who Bought $20.8 Million Worth of ETH on Chain at a High Slippage Is Now Facing a $1.645 Million Unrealized Loss
item.description: On August 1st, according to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), on July 28th, he purchased 5,073.16 ETH at a price that was higher than on CEX. The cost per ETH was $37, but he bought at $3,958 per ETH, almost at the short-term high. He is currently in an unrealized loss of $1.645 million and has not yet sold or transferred.

item.title: Binance now supports users to directly activate the Staking feature through their spot wallet account.
item.description: On August 1st, according to an official announcement, Binance has initiated a Spot Account Soft Staking feature. This enables users to effortlessly activate soft staking directly through their spot accounts without the need to lock their funds in order to receive staking rewards. Currently, supported tokens comprise BNB, SOL, ADA, SUSHI, TON, NEAR, POLY, ALGO, SAND, AXS, and others. The staking rewards will be distributed to the spot account on a daily basis.

item.title: Tether Surpasses South Korea as the 18th Largest Holder of US Treasury Bonds
item.description: On August 1st, according to Messari data, Tether has overtaken South Korea and become the 18th largest holder of U.S. Treasury bonds.Yesterday, Tether released its second-quarter financial report indicating that its holdings of U.S. bonds exceed $127 billion.
